capabilities.name: Commit to Customer Service
capabilities.description: The role requires providing high-quality customer service, responding to visitor needs in a professional, courteous, and friendly manner.

capabilities.name: Communicate Effectively
capabilities.description: Requires excellent oral communication skills for dealing with customer inquiries and providing up-to-date visitor information.

capabilities.name: Manage Self
capabilities.description: The role demands managing competing priorities in a high-volume environment, requiring self-motivation and a measured approach.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Involves working as part of a close-knit team to support day-to-day operations of Visitor Entrance Stations.

capabilities.name: Technology
capabilities.description: Basic computer skills are required for administrative duties and operating a two-way radio.

skills.name: Customer Inquiry Management
skills.description: Handling and managing customer inquiries in a manner that addresses concerns and provides relevant information.

skills.name: Fee Collection
skills.description: Collecting park use fees as part of park compliance administrative duties.

skills.name: Use of Technology
skills.description: Utilizing basic computer systems and two-way radios for effective communication and administrative tasks.

generalRole.title: Visitor Service Support Specialist
generalRole.description: This role specializes in providing visitor services and administrative support at national park entrance stations, focusing on customer service, fee collection, and compliance duties.
